Class MatrixUtils

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.MatrixUtils
public class MatrixUtils extends Object
Utility class for performing 2D matrix operations.

This class handles low-level grid logic such as collision detection (intersection), merging shapes into the board, and detecting/clearing full rows.

  • Method Details

    • intersect

      public static boolean intersect(int[][] matrix, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Checks if the brick at a given position collides with the board boundaries or existing blocks.

      Fixed logic: Loops now correctly map row to Y and col to X to prevent coordinate transposition errors.

      Parameters:
      matrix - The current state of the board grid.
      brick - The shape matrix of the brick being checked.
      x - The target column index (x-coordinate).
      y - The target row index (y-coordinate).
      Returns:
      true if a collision is detected or if the brick is out of bounds, false otherwise.

    • checkOutOfBound

      private static boolean checkOutOfBound(int[][] matrix, int targetX, int targetY)
      Helper method to check if a specific coordinate is outside the board grid.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The board grid.
      targetX - The column index to check.
      targetY - The row index to check.
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate is outside the array bounds.

    • copy

      public static int[][] copy(int[][] original)
      Creates a deep copy of a 2D integer array.
      Parameters:
      original - The array to copy.
      Returns:
      A new, independent 2D array containing the same values.

    • merge

      public static int[][] merge(int[][] filledFields, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Merges a brick into the board matrix at the specified position.

      Returns a new matrix representing the board state after the brick is locked in place.

      Parameters:
      filledFields - The current board matrix.
      brick - The shape matrix of the brick to merge.
      x - The column index where the brick landed.
      y - The row index where the brick landed.
      Returns:
      A new 2D array with the brick's blocks added to the grid.

    • checkRemoving

      public static ClearRow checkRemoving(int[][] matrix)
      Checks the board for complete rows, removes them, and shifts blocks down.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The current board matrix.
      Returns:
      A ClearRow object containing the number of cleared lines and the updated matrix.

    • deepCopyList

      public static List<int[][]> deepCopyList(List<int[][]> list)
      Creates a deep copy of a list of 2D arrays.

      Used mainly for cloning brick rotation states.

      Parameters:
      list - The list of matrices to copy.
      Returns:
      A new list containing deep copies of the matrices.
